# TabulaMurisSenisData 

To be available at https://bioconductor.org/packages/TabulaMurisSenisData/.

This is an R/[ExperimentHub](https://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/ExperimentHub.html) package for accessing data from...

## Some additional information

- This current release includes the following datasets:

```{r, eval = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
knitr::kable(
  data.frame(
    `dataset ID` = c(),
    `subset` = c(), 
    `species` = c(), 
    `technology` = c(),
    `cell number` = c(),
    `description` = c()
    )
  )
# maybe put a screenshot of iSEE viewing tSNE of each set?
```
